title: Bikewatching
description: An interactive map that explores Boston-area bike traffic over the course of the day using Mapbox, D3, and real Bluebikes data.

title: When It Rains, It Pours
description: Bar chart exploration of California precipitation under different climate scenarios using CMIP6 model outputs.

title: Hip Hop Vocabulary Exploration
description: Replicated and critiqued The Pudding’s ‘Largest Vocabulary in Hip Hop’ data story with my own visual encodings.

title: Interactive Rainfall Dashboard
description: Multi-view interactive dashboard that lets users explore California rainfall patterns by scenario, season, and year.

title: MoveInSync Internship – Commute Analytics Dashboard
description: Analyzed employee commute data and designed dashboards to highlight seat utilization, on-time performance, and cost.

title: Yellow.ai Internship – Conversation Flow Templates
description: Created reusable templates for AI chatbot flows and evaluated voice/chat conversations for UX and quality.

title: 57 Forward – Trading Strategy Prototype
description: Built an Excel-based prototype for back-testing equity trading strategies and computing performance KPIs.

title: Mu Sigma – Data Science Foundations
description: Used SQL and structured problem-solving tools to explore datasets and present findings to a mock client.

title: Robotics Internship – Tinkercad Robot Design
description: Designed and programmed a virtual robot in Tinkercad to complete a challenge using sensor-based logic.

title: Personal – FiberLens Concept
description: Concept for a digital microscope app that lets users inspect clothing fibers to make more informed purchase choices.

title: Personal – Portfolio Website
description: This multi-page personal site with navigation, dark mode toggle, JSON-driven projects, and GitHub stats.

title: Course – Degree Audit Redesign Case Study
description: UX case study analyzing UCSD’s degree audit tool with interviews, task flows, and redesign sketches.

title: Writing Center – Tutoring Resources Mini-Site
description: Organized and drafted a resource collection for students on essay structure, grammar, and drafting strategies.
